tool_description: Converts normalized text into phonetic representations using IPA or language-specific phoneme sets for accurate pronunciation in speech synthesis.

normalized_text.description: Normalized text to convert to phonetic representation

language_code.description: ISO 639-1 language code for phonetic rules

phoneme_set.description: Phoneme representation system: IPA, ARPABET, or language-specific

stress_marking.description: Whether to include stress markers in phonetic output

error_messages: Unsupported phoneme set: Use IPA, ARPABET, or supported language-specific phoneme set.
Language-phoneme mismatch: The selected phoneme set is not compatible with the language.
Conversion failed: Unable to convert some words to phonetic representation.
usage: Provide normalized_text and language_code. Optionally specify phoneme_set and stress_marking preferences. Returns phonetic representation for speech synthesis.

unknown_words.description: Words that could not be converted phonetically
